特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Intensive English will prepare students to learn through a number of different academic contexts. Students can expect to learn through in-class lectures and discussions, however if COVID conditions worsen, the university might require us to conduct classes online. Through group and pair-work, students should plan on doing projects and presentations. A large portion of student grades will be determined via peer assessment.
